meanings.sent1: The quadrumanous monkey climbed the tree with ease.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumanous creature scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumanous squirrel juggled four acorns at once.
meanings.sent4: Her quadrumanous dexterity amazed everyone at the circus.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumanous bear stood tall on all fours, a majestic sight.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to primates with four hands or feet.
meanings.sent1: The quadrumanous apes swung gracefully through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumanous species displayed remarkable intelligence.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumanous family reunion was a lively affair.
meanings.sent4: Her quadrumanous agility in the obstacle course was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumanous primates communicated using intricate gestures.
